mapper.sql: task_id, identity_id, used_core, used_memory, used_Bandwidth, rec_update_time
mapper.select: SELECT tpp.*, o.`name` AS node_name, o.identity_id AS node_identityId, o.carrier_node_id AS node_id FROM task_power_provider AS tpp LEFT JOIN task_org AS o ON tpp.identity_id = o.identity_id WHERE tpp.task_id = #{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
replace into task_power_provider (task_id, identity_id, used_core, used_memory, used_Bandwidth, rec_update_time ) values
(#{item.taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.identityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.usedCore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.usedMemory,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.usedBandwidth,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.recUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into task_power_provider
task_id,
identity_id,
used_core,
used_memory,
used_Bandwidth,
rec_update_time,

update task_power_provider
used_core = #{usedCore,jdbcType=INTEGER},
used_memory = #{usedMemory,jdbcType=BIGINT},
used_Bandwidth = #{usedBandwidth,jdbcType=BIGINT},
rec_update_time = #{recUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where task_id = #{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and identity_id = #{identityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
